Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It is not clear whether such mutants really behave as loss - of - function mutants as predicted by haploinsufficiency .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| haploinsufficiency |

Note: "haploinsufficiency" is a term used in genetics to describe a situation where having only one functional copy of a gene is not enough to maintain normal function, leading to a genetic disorder. It is included as a "Disease" entity because it refers to a genetic condition that can result in disease.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| haploinsufficiency |

Note: "haploinsufficiency" is the only term in the paragraph that clearly refers to a "Disease" entity. The term "loss - of - function mutants" is a general genetic term and does not specifically refer to a particular disease.
